document_data.name: Hopala
document_data.mainbody: '''Hopala''' was the [[pueblo priest]] of [[Kin Elbhaz]] in the [[Pasocada Basin]] in [[Maztica]]. He was overweight and uninspiring, but curious about outsiders and would use any opportunity to quiz them.
